com.google.gwt.text.client

Class NumberFormatRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.text.shared.AbstractRenderer<java.lang.Number>
      • com.google.gwt.text.client.NumberFormatRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer<java.lang.Number>

    public class NumberFormatRenderer
extends AbstractRenderer<java.lang.Number>
    Renders Number objects with a NumberFormat.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NumberFormatRenderer()
      Create an instance using NumberFormat.getDecimalFormat().
      NumberFormatRenderer(NumberFormat format)
      Create an instance with the given format.
